channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2025011145
item.description:

  • State: MA

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING HAZMAT WAS FOUND IN THE SORT AISLE. PACKAGE WAS CONTAINED AND BROUGHT TO THE DMP USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED USING THE DECISION TREE FOR CORROSIVE LIQUIDS.
